title: Womens Dress

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shrug cardigan chic and feminine, with a perfect weight for summer and nice stretch that doesn't get sloppy-looking. They appreciate its wide variety of colors and how it complements sleeveless dresses, with one customer noting it's great for travel or chilly venues. While many it fits amazing, some mention it runs a bit small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am pleased with this purchase
items.body: I ordered the navy blue, dusty pink, red, gray, brown, turquoise, cream, lemon yellow, and lavender. I am 5 foot five and 117 pounds. They fit perfectly without stretching them or anything. I just had to pull them down a little in the back to make them longer. They have ALOT of stretch to them, so I feel like they would fit me if I had an extra 50 pounds on me, maybe even more. If you tie it in the front it ends up stretching it out a little to make it longer in the front, but not in a weird way, so it looks fine and you can still wear it straight down afterward. The one thing I was worried about is if the material would be itchy but it isn't. The colors of the navy blue, dusty pink, red, gray, and brown are perfectly normal and very pretty. I am returning the turquoise, cream, lemon yellow, and lavender. I am very white and pale skin with blond hair and green eyes and these colors were very harsh on my skin tone. I felt like they were a little off compared to normal colors of those descriptions. But these four colors would look excellent on African-American skin or an olive complexion in my personal opinion. They just made me look too yellow-ish. I was disappointed in the lemon yellow because it was not a soft lemon color. It was more of a neon yellow. Didn't like it. The turquoise was pretty true to a turquoise color and actually it didn't look too bad on me but I had the navy one and I didn't absolutely love the turquoise so I'm returning it. In my opinion, the beige was not really a true beige... it had kind of a strange yellowish tint to it. Very unattractive on my skin... but like I said on African-American skin or an olive complexion it would look beautiful. I was super disappointed in the lavender. It tended to be a little more neon-ish and not a soft lavender. But the navy blue, dusty pink, red, gray, and brown are very true to their color description. The brown is like a chocolate and I was relieved because the picture made it look kind of like an orangey brown but it's definitely a chocolate brown. The dusty pink is very soft and feminine, the navy is a typical navy, and the red is very pretty... it's more of a burgundy red not an orange red. The dark gray is very nice, and about the color depth of a navy blue or black. I know that they will be one of those types of clothing that you have to be very careful about snagging. They are really lightweight and are going to be perfect to wear over sundresses in the summer without being overheated or even feeling like you have anything on. So they're perfect for me because I don't like my upper arms showing, yet they are see-through so you see your skin and everything but they kind of cover up a little saggy skin LOL. All in all, I'm very happy with this purchase because, as any of you know who have been trying to find decent shrugs, it isn't an easy task... especially trying to find colors other than black, white, or ivory. I had no luck at the mall's or anywhere and just found this on Amazon and thought I'd give it a shot. I feel like they're a little overpriced and I would've preferred to pay like 12 bucks apiece but it's worth it considering I couldn't find any elbow length shrugs of various colors elsewhere and they go with all my sundresses .... so I hope this review helps anybody who has any questions :) Read more
items.author: Mike

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Shrug to hide the arms!
items.body: **Perfect for Any Season & Stylish Too!** ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5) I absolutely *love* this sheer shrug! I ended up buying it in **six colors** because it’s just that amazing. The lightweight, breathable fabric makes it perfect for hot weather, while still providing just enough coverage to make you feel confident and stylish. It’s ideal for those times when you want to cover your upper arms without feeling too hot or restricted. The **sheer material** is so soft and lightweight that it drapes beautifully over your shoulders, adding a delicate and elegant touch to any outfit. I’ve worn it over dresses, tank tops, and even casual tees, and it instantly *elevates* my look. It's amazing how something so simple can make an outfit look so much more polished! Here’s why I think it’s a must-have: * **Versatile and stylish**: The shrug can dress up any casual outfit, whether you're heading to a party, dinner, or just hanging out. It gives your look that extra bit of flair without being too over-the-top. * **Perfect for covering arms**: If you're like me and feel uncomfortable showing your upper arms, this shrug is a game-changer. It provides just the right amount of coverage while still being airy and comfortable. * **Color options**: I bought it in **red**, **denim blue**, **white**, **orange**, **tan**, and **black**. Each color is vibrant and beautiful! Whether I’m dressing up for a night out or keeping it casual, I always have a perfect match for my outfit. * **Great for warm weather**: Since it’s sheer, I never feel hot or overheated when wearing it. The fabric lets air through, keeping me comfortable even in the summer heat. * **Affordable and durable**: Despite how delicate it looks, this shrug is incredibly durable. The material hasn’t torn or frayed, and the colors haven't faded after several washes. In summary, this sheer shrug is a **must-have** wardrobe piece that combines **comfort**, **style**, and **versatility**. Whether you want to add a little extra elegance to a dress or cover up your arms in the summer, it’s the perfect solution. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a stylish, breathable, and flattering accessory! Read more
items.author: Sherol Zuniga

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sheer summer wrap
items.body: Lightweight cardigan perfect for summer. Not much coverage as the material is very sheer but looks good when you have a tank top on and just wants a slight coverage. Read more
items.author: Hulagurlie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Way to Add a Little Color!
items.body: Super cute to uplift and add a pop of color to an outfit! Comfortable and can be worn in a few ways and is flattering. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too expensive but versatile and I'm keeping it
items.body: This exceeded my expectations. If it weren't so expensive, I'd buy additional bc it's very snaggable. It would be good to have a 'pristine' one on hand in additionto daily. Color is good. Sizing. Believe it's one fits all. I usually wear a small or medium & this fit great. It's kind of soft Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect!
items.body: So pretty and well made Read more
items.author: Peggy B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and cool shrug, but too expensive!!
items.body: This is the second shrug I have ordered, just in another color. I like it for summer as it is mesh where air able to get in. I got this one for a trip to Greece where the temperatures will be warmer. This is perfect as there is no weight to it at all and stretches to where anyone from a small to an XXL could wear it. I am between a med-large/ 38C. Holds up and washes well. It can be tied several different ways. I do not mind paying more for well made clothes, however for the type of material and amount of material used this item is way way overpriced. It probably took less than a dollar to make!! However I will use often, so you are paying mostly for demand. Wish someone else made them for competition! Read more
items.author: kfilo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love - Hope They Last!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE these shrugs!! I must have at least 5 different colors and I love every one of them!!!! They’re so light weight. Vibrant colors! The fit is so cute! I do worry about if they are going to fall apart after a few washes. They seem very fragile so I’mbvery careful with them. I probably only worn each one twice so far, so we’ll see. If they do fall apart, I will definitely not buy another. They are quite pricey as is!9 Read more
items.author: Rain

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Sand, Seashell, Tuscany Gold, Peach, Sunshine, Black, Cobalt, Orange, Neon Green, Lime, Baby Blue, Plum, Blush Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
